source:
import React from 'react'; import type { GeneKeysData } from './types'; interface HologenicProfileTabProps { geneKeysData: GeneKeysData; } const HologenicProfileTab: React.FC = React.memo(({ geneKeysData }) => { // Strict null/undefined check for hologenetic_profile if (geneKeysData.hologenetic_profile == null || typeof geneKeysData.hologenetic_profile !== 'object') { return (

No Hologenetic Profile data available

); } return (
{/* Header */}

Hologenetic Profile

Your unique pattern of consciousness evolution and integration path through the Gene Keys system

{/* Profile Description */}

Your Consciousness Blueprint

{geneKeysData.hologenetic_profile.description}

{/* Integration Path */}

Integration Path

{geneKeysData.hologenetic_profile.integration_path.map((step, index) => (
{index + 1}

{step}

))}
{/* Contemplation Sequence */} {geneKeysData.contemplation_sequence != null && Array.isArray(geneKeysData.contemplation_sequence) && geneKeysData.contemplation_sequence.length > 0 && (

Contemplation Sequence

A personalized sequence of Gene Keys for deep contemplation practice, designed to support your unique path of consciousness evolution.

{geneKeysData.contemplation_sequence.map((keyNumber, index) => (
{keyNumber}
#{index + 1}
))}
Contemplation Practice:
  • Work with one Gene Key per week or month, depending on your pace
  • Follow the sequence order for optimal integration
  • Journal insights and observe how patterns shift in your life
  • Return to the beginning when you complete the full sequence
)} {/* Integration Wisdom */}

Living Your Hologenetic Profile

Your Hologenetic Profile represents the unique way consciousness expresses itself through you. It's not a fixed destiny, but a living, evolving pattern that unfolds through your conscious participation.

Key Principles:
  • Trust your unique timing and rhythm
  • Embrace both shadow and light aspects
  • Allow natural transformation without force
Daily Practice:
  • Observe patterns without judgment
  • Cultivate patience with your process
  • Trust your inner wisdom and intuition
); }); HologenicProfileTab.displayName = 'HologenicProfileTab'; export default HologenicProfileTab;

import { ChevronDownIcon } from '@radix-ui/react-icons'; import React from 'react'; import * as Accordion from '@radix-ui/react-accordion'; import { SynthesisChartData } from './types'; interface Props { data: SynthesisChartData; } const SynthesisChart: React.FC = ({ data }) => { if (!data) return

No synthesis data available

; return (

Integrated Analysis

Synthesis of insights from all astrological traditions

Primary Themes
{(data.primary_themes || []).map((theme, idx) => ( {theme} ))}
Life Purpose Integration
{(data.life_purpose || []).map((purpose, idx) => (

{purpose}

))}
Personality Integration
{Object.entries(data.personality_integration || {}).map(([aspect, traits]: [string, string[]]) => (

{aspect.replace('_', ' ')}:

{(traits || []).map((trait, idx) => (

{trait}

))}
))}
Spiritual Path
{(data.spiritual_path || []).map((guidance, idx) => (

{guidance}

))}
); }; export default SynthesisChart;

import { ChevronDownIcon } from '@radix-ui/react-icons'; import React from 'react'; import * as Accordion from '@radix-ui/react-accordion'; import { UranianChartData } from './types'; interface Props { data: UranianChartData; } const UranianChart: React.FC = ({ data }) => { if (!data) return

No Uranian astrology data available

; return (

Uranian Astrology

{data.description}

Transneptunian Points {Object.entries(data.uranian_planets || {}).map(([planet, info]: [string, { symbol?: string; position?: number; meaning?: string }]) => ( ))}
Planet Position Meaning
{info.symbol} {planet.charAt(0).toUpperCase() + planet.slice(1)}
{info.position?.toFixed(2)} {info.meaning}
90 Dial Aspects {(data.dial_aspects || []).slice(0, 8).map((aspect, idx) => ( ))}
Bodies Aspect Orb Meaning
{aspect.body1} - {aspect.body2} {aspect.angle} {aspect.orb?.toFixed(2)} {aspect.meaning}
); }; export default UranianChart;

import { ChevronDownIcon } from '@radix-ui/react-icons'; import React from 'react'; import * as Accordion from '@radix-ui/react-accordion'; import { VedicChartData } from './types'; interface Props { data: VedicChartData; } const VedicChart: React.FC = ({ data }) => { if (!data) return

No Vedic astrology data available

; return (

Vedic Sidereal Astrology

{data.description}

Ayanamsa: {data.ayanamsa?.toFixed(4)}

Lunar Analysis

Moon Sign (Rashi): {data.analysis?.moon_sign}

{data.analysis?.analysis}

 Planets & Nakshatras {Object.entries(data.planets || {}).map(([planet, info]: [string, { vedic_sign?: string; nakshatra?: { name?: string; pada?: string } }]) => ( ))}
Planet Sign Nakshatra
{planet} {info.vedic_sign} {info.nakshatra?.name} (Pada {info.nakshatra?.pada})
); }; export default VedicChart;

suggestions.desc: Explicitly treat nullish value the same as false (`value ?? false`)

messages.message: Prefer using nullish coalescing operator (`??`) instead of a ternary expression, as it is simpler to read.

import { ChevronDownIcon } from '@radix-ui/react-icons'; import React from 'react'; import * as Accordion from '@radix-ui/react-accordion'; import { WesternChartData } from './types'; import { planetSymbols, aspectSymbols, getZodiacSign } from './utils'; interface Props { data?: WesternChartData; } const WesternChart: React.FC = ({ data }) => { if (data?.planets == null) return

No Western chart data available

; return (

Western Tropical Chart

Based on tropical zodiac, solar-focused approach emphasizing personality and life expression

Planets & Positions {Object.keys(data.planets).length}
{Object.entries(data.planets).map(([planet, info]: [string, { position: number; retrograde?: boolean }]) => ( ))}
Planet Position Retrograde
{planetSymbols[planet as keyof typeof planetSymbols] || ''} {planet.replace('_', ' ')}
{getZodiacSign(info.position)} {info.retrograde ? ( ) : ( )}
Aspects {data.aspects != null ? data.aspects.length : 0}
{(data.aspects != null ? data.aspects : []).map((aspect, idx) => ( ))}
Aspect Type Planets Orb
{aspectSymbols[aspect.aspect as keyof typeof aspectSymbols] || ''} {aspect.aspect}
{aspect.point1} - {aspect.point2}

{aspect.point1_sign} (H{aspect.point1_house}) - {aspect.point2_sign} (H{aspect.point2_house})

{aspect.orb.toFixed(2)}
); }; export default WesternChart;

source:
import React from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import { FaTimesCircle, FaArrowLeft, FaCreditCard, FaCommentDots, FaSyncAlt } from 'react-icons/fa'; import { Button } from '@cosmichub/ui'; import { Card } from '@cosmichub/ui'; export const SubscriptionCancelledPage: React.FC = () => { return (
{/* Cancellation Header */}

Subscription Cancelled

Your subscription has been successfully cancelled

{/* Cancellation Confirmation */}

Your cancellation is now active

Status: Cancelled
Access until: End of billing period
Next billing: None

Good news! You'll continue to have access to all premium features until the end of your current billing period. After that, your account will automatically switch to our free plan.

{/* Next Steps */}

What happens next?

{/* Feedback Section */}

Help us improve

We're sorry to see you go! Your feedback helps us make CosmicHub better for everyone.

Takes less than 2 minutes Completely optional

); }; export default SubscriptionCancelledPage;
